tgt_original: śīlaṃ śrutiśca karuṇā ca sudhośca yasya  nityaṃ sa eva sugatārcanakṛnnigadyate || 2 ||
sattvārthameva tanumeṣa samudvahāmi |  naivaṃ kriyeta yadi sattvahitaṃ mayā ced  vyarthaṃ karomi tanupoṣaṇamannapānaiḥ || 3 ||
sattvān hinasti manasāpi hi yaḥ sa kasmān-
dārāḥ sutāśca vibhavaśca mahattva (cca) rājyaṃ  māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitavase nayate śarīram || 5 ||
sattvā eva gajādibhāvagatayo dattā mayā'nekaśaḥ  sattvā eva ca pātratāmupagataṃ deyaṃ mayā grāhitāḥ |
sattvāneva na pālayāmi yadi cet kasyārthamarthaḥ kṛtaḥ || 9 ||
saṃsāre vyasanābhighātabahule na syuryadi prāṇino  janmāvartaviḍambanena yamalokaṃ prāpya sātmīkṛtāḥ |
kasyārthena samīhitaṃ yadi na me sattvā bhaveyuḥ priyāḥ || 10 ||
yāvaccedaṃ jvalati jagataḥ śāsanaṃ śāsanaṃ me
sattvārthena samudyatena manasā mārasya bhagnaṃ balaṃ
sattvaireva tathā tathā viracitaṃ yenāsmi buddhaḥ kṛtaḥ || 7 ||
kasmin vastuni siddhyatāmiha kṛpā maitrī ca kvālambatāṃ  kvopekṣāmuditādivastuviṣayaḥ kasmin vimokṣādayaḥ |  kasyārthe karuṇāpareṇa manasaḥ kṣāntiściraṃ bhāvitā  na syurjanmani janma(ni)
